Good Evening you all!!!

    First of all, I would like to introduce myself=
. My name is Natan Ruiz, I=B4m brazilian student (architecture). Obviously =
in deep interest on japanese ancient culture and samurai tradicion. Iaijuts=
u and Kenjutsu student as well. 

    I found this group on Samurai Archive=
s page, and I feel really pleased to join this mailing list, which it seems=
 to be an outstanding source of knowledge and communication with people jus=
t like me. Domo Arigat=F4 Gozaimashit=E1! =3D)

Anyway, I invoque the atten=
tion of experts and "sempais" to call some help!!

I=B4m in need of some ma=
terial about the European influence over Japan. And I say I=B4m REALLY in n=
eed of it, in order to accomplish a project. Portuguese arrivals and the je=
suits, so as the trade relations with daymios, but specially in care of the=
 introduction of Christianism, and the great cultural conflict with buddhis=
m, and japanese manners, IN DETAILS. I=B4ve spent lot of time in reserch, b=
ut not very sucessfull. Maybe because it=B4s a very specific subject, I kno=
w that. I=B4ve had some contact with portuguese authors (Rainer Dahnenhardt=
) and some institutions, but It=B4s pretty hard to find support. Since I jo=
ined the group, I=B4m looking all the messages sent here, to see If I find =
something. (sorry if i=B4m repeating this subject) Anyway, It would help me=
 a lot if anyone could point me author, books, sites, or even better, spend=
 some time writing about it for me! hehehehe

Please mail me (rnascimento@t=
riang.com.br) 
And once again, thank you for accepting me! I hope to be hel=
pfull around here!

PS - Sorry about poor english! =3D/

Natan Ruiz
